participant_1.background:
My dad was a cop and my wife just left me
i drive a fast sports car.
I like to read to my baby, so there's always a book in her nursery.
Since my new job is physically demanding, I try to go for a walk every day.
I cherish my Kesha concert ticket stub.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy working with my hands and seeing the results of my work.
i love dancing.
i will study computer science.
I used to be very closed off about my sexuality.
I'm trying to balance my school work with my social life and my workouts.

content.text: Hello, what do you do for work?
I am a student, studying computer science.
Oh wow, cool! What made you decide to go into computer science?
I've always enjoyed working with my hands and seeing the results of my work.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great in the field.
Thanks! I'm trying to balance my school work with my social life and my workouts.
That's tough, but I'm sure you can do it! What kind of workouts do you do?
I love dancing! It's a great way to stay active and have fun.
That's so cool! I used to be a dancer, but I don't have much time for it anymore.
Aw, that's too bad. It's such a great way to express yourself.
It really is. What kind of music do you like to dance to?
I love all kinds of music, but I especially love dancing to Kesha.
Kesha is awesome! I saw her in concert a few years ago and it was amazing.
Oh my god, I'm so jealous! I've always wanted to see her in concert.
You should definitely try to go see her next time she's in town. It's an amazing experience.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
